casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jonathan Denard BOYCE. No. 129A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 25, 2007. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*380The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2007 by Defendant to Deem Defendant-Appellant's Brief Timely Filed:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of April 2007."
